regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 msource=re.findall('(?s)(gwtHash.*?)class=.navigation',page_data)[0].replace('amp;','') hash,plink,edata=re.findall('(?s)gwtHash:"([^"]+).+?data-url="/(video/c[^"]+).+?data-last-element="([^"]+)',msource)[0] list=re.findall('video-card_img-w".+?src="([^"]+).+?data-movie-id="([^"]+).+?title="([^-]+)',msource) for pn in range(2,4): data={'fetch':'false','st.page':str(pn),'st.lastelem':str(edata),'gwt.requested':str(hash)} source=requests.post('https://ok.ru/'+plink,headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0','host':'ok.ru','origin':'https://ok.ru','accept':'*/*'},data=data).content.replace('amp;','') list +=re.findall('video-card_img-w".+?src="([^"]+).+?data-movie-id="([^"]+).+?title="([^-]+)',source) return list
